column1: Belemir was the son of [[Beldir]] and husband to [[Adanel]] of the [[House of Hador
column2: House of Marach]]. He fathered [[Beren (son of Belemir)
column4: Beren Erchamion]], hero of the First Age.<ref>{{WJ
column5: West}}, ''Commentary, (i) The House of Bëor'', p. 231</ref>

column1: There were two versions of the genealogical table for the House of Hador.  In the first version of the table there was a note that Beren, son of Belemir and Adanel, was their fifth child. In the second version there was no reference to these other children.  The section of the second version shown above shows only the first Beren although the other children may have existed.<ref>{{WJ
column2: West}}, ''Commentary, (ii) The House of Hador'', p. 233</ref>
